Sentencas: This study aims to exploit the effects of little impurity ions on the properties and performance of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) towards the development of membranes for oxygen separation and electrodes for oxygen reduction.
Titulo: The influence of impurity ions on the permeation and oxygen reduction properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ perovs kite

Sentencas: The influences of impurity ions (Na+, K+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Crx+, Mnx+, Si4+ and Cl-) on the crystal structure, electrical conductivity, oxygen desorption/permeation behavior, sintering behavior and oxygen reduction activity of BSCF were systematically investigated.
Titulo: The influence of impurity ions on the permeation and oxygen reduction properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ perovs kite

Sentencas: Rietveld refinements of the powder X-ray diffraction patterns revealed that most of the impurity ions, except Mg2+ and Si4+, can incorporate into the BSCF lattice without changing the lattice symmetry or forming new phases.
Titulo: The influence of impurity ions on the permeation and oxygen reduction properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ perovs kite

Sentencas: The membrane containing the Mg2+ impurity exhibited a reduced grain size, whereas the membrane containing the Cl- impurity exhibits poor sintering ability.
Titulo: The influence of impurity ions on the permeation and oxygen reduction properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ perovs kite

Sentencas: The fluctuation in the oxygen permeation flux of the BSCF membranes could be correlated to their different sintering abilities and to the site doped with the impurity ions.
Titulo: The influence of impurity ions on the permeation and oxygen reduction properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ perovs kite

Sentencas: The impedance spectra of symmetrical cells with BSCF electrodes containing various impurity ions showed that the small impurity ions did not strongly affect the electrode performance.
Titulo: The influence of impurity ions on the permeation and oxygen reduction properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ perovs kite

Sentencas: These results suggested that low purity raw materials could be used to prepare BSCF materials, thus improving their economic attractiveness.
Titulo: The influence of impurity ions on the permeation and oxygen reduction properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ perovs kite
